com.jaxio.celerio.template.pack

Interface TemplatePack

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClasspathResourcePack, ClasspathResourceUncryptedPack, LocalResourcePackFile

    public interface TemplatePack

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Returns the template pack name.
      Template getTemplateByName(String name)
      Lookup a template by its name (as returned by getTemplateNames()).
      List<String> getTemplateNames()
      Returns the name of all the templates contained in this pack.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the template pack name. For example "pack-backend".

      • getTemplateNames

        List<String> getTemplateNames()
        Returns the name of all the templates contained in this pack. If the template pack is a folder, the name may contains a relative path.

      • getTemplateByName

        Template getTemplateByName(String name)
                           throws IOException
        Lookup a template by its name (as returned by getTemplateNames()).
        Throws:
        IOException
